name: CartRAGE
description:
The console is corrupted! 

It's affecting the gameplay of Classic Cartridge games!

- Click the game cartridge to put it in the console and play the game!

- Controls: W, A, S, D = movement

Challenges:

Stick to the grid challenge

Your game sticks to a grid - (ex. 64x64)

No overlaying graphics challenge

At no point in your game do the graphics overlap
